{"name": ["盐水虾"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471227314646972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["青虾", "花椒", "八角", "桂皮", "香叶", "辣椒", "葱", "姜", "蒜", "料酒", "生抽", "香醋", "香油"], "taste": "清淡", "carfts": "煮", "time": "半小时", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["炒锅中放适量水，加入适量葱、姜、八角、花椒、桂皮、香叶、辣椒、料酒、盐，大火烧开，舀出一小盆冷却，能完全淹住虾即可（炒锅中剩余的水也能完全淹住虾）。", "抠开虾头一侧，拽出虾肠（如果虾肠中间断掉，可从虾尾倒数第二节处用牙签挑开，拽出虾肠），挤出虾头里的脏东西，反复冲洗干净，注意保持虾的完整。", "再次大火烧开，倒入青虾，水开后大火煮三四分钟即可。", "取出青虾，倒入刚才的五香料水里浸泡15分钟。", "小碗里调适量姜末、蒜蓉、生抽、香油，做蘸料。", "将浸泡好的虾摆盘，夏天可在盘底加冰块，口感更好。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471194848326972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471231078286972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471232045486972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471234225146972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471235159836972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/10/2019011015471235928826972401.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：炒锅", "category": ["家常菜", "海鲜"]}

{"name": ["白萝卜炒鲜贝"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/08/2019010815469206461991806550.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["白萝卜", "鲜贝", "食盐", "鸡精", "葱", "姜", "香菜"], "taste": "咸鲜", "carfts": "炒", "time": "十分钟", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["取一些原浆扇贝丁。", "化冻洗净。", "捞出贝丁备用。", "切葱姜。", "热锅冷油。", "放食盐。", "白萝卜洗净打丝。", "萝卜丝放锅里翻炒。", "萝卜变软放扇贝丁。", "翻炒至汤汁奶白色，盖锅盖焖1分钟。", "洗香菜切末。", "放锅里，放鸡精，搅拌均匀即可。", "捞出白萝卜装盘。", "最后浇上剩余的汤汁。", "成品。"], "stepPicture_url": {"name": ["咸菜煮花螺"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513052548319404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["花螺", "咸菜", "料酒", "盐", "味精"], "taste": "清淡", "carfts": "煮", "time": "十分钟", "difficulty": "普通", "step": ["食材：花螺（已清洗）、咸菜（已清洗切开）", "烧锅倒油烧热，下入切好的咸菜翻炒翻炒。", "接着，合入已清洗好的花螺。", "加适量的料酒。", "加适量的清水。", "翻动一下煮开煮上3分钟。", "然后，加适量的盐。", "加适量的味精。", "调味翻匀即成。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513156931708404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513160854717404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513164277846404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513168155410404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513171949912404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513175679679404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513180136689404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513183983332404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/03/201901031546513187294571404188.JPG?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：炒锅", "category": ["家常菜", "海鲜"]}

{"name": ["香煎三文鱼"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461654865398221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["三文鱼", "柠檬", "圣女果", "苦苣", "盐", "黑胡椒粉", "油"], "taste": "咸鲜", "carfts": "煎", "time": "廿分钟", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["备好食材，三文鱼洗净。", "三文鱼去皮去刺切片，撒上盐、黑胡椒粉和柠檬汁腌制20分钟。", "平底锅放少许油，放入三文鱼块中小火煎至。", "至两面金黄关火。", "苦苣洗净控水拌盐铺到盘子上，圣女果洗净切开摆盘，加了两片柠檬片。", "成品。", "成品。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461657491558221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461658637668221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461659167848221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461659524428221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461659804648221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461660154888221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/30/2018123015461663198998221247.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：平底锅", "category": ["热菜", "家常菜", "海鲜", "午餐", "晚餐", "烛光晚餐"]}

{"name": ["椒盐小河虾"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635543886210609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["小河虾", "油", "椒盐"], "taste": "咸香", "carfts": "炸", "time": "廿分钟", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["小河虾清洗干净后控干水份。", "锅加入适量油，烧至5成热，下小虾。", "中火炸干。", "打起控油。", "加入适量椒盐粉拌匀。", "装盘。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635578014610609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635586447810609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635591191910609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635594333810609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635600834310609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/01/20190101154635603252510609838.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：炒锅", "category": ["家常菜", "海鲜", "午餐", "晚餐"]}

{"name": ["生炝小河虾"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462668846466259694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["料酒", "生抽", "香醋", "白砂糖", "老姜", "大蒜", "橙皮", "小香葱"], "taste": "咸鲜", "carfts": "炝", "time": "廿分钟", "difficulty": "普通", "step": ["把买回来的小河虾清理干净。", "用水冲洗干净后再用清水活养1个小时，然后倒掉清水，再用凉开水漂洗后养20分钟，把水倒去后沥干水份。", "把老姜，大蒜分别剁成小粒，香葱切成碎末，再用1块橙皮去掉里面白色部分后切成碎末。", "把清洗干净的小河虾放入碗中，加入料酒，生抽，香醋，白砂糖，拌匀后再把姜蒜葱末放进去一起拌匀，等入味后就可以吃了。", "炝好的小河虾，吃上去生嫩，清鲜，加上各种调料复合味的辅佐，确是难得的美味。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462671112562329694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462671147677349694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462671195538989694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462671241382629694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/31/2018123115462671303851839694186.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：其他", "category": ["家常菜", "海鲜", "秋季食谱", "冬季食谱"]}

{"name": ["紫苏豉蒜炒蚬"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738862286311132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["蚬", "油", "豆豉", "蒜", "姜丝", "紫苏"], "taste": "咸甜", "carfts": "炒", "time": "十分钟", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["预备材料，清洗干净。", "热油，下姜丝。", "再下豆豉蒜蓉，爆香。", "再下蚬。", "翻炒几下，（蚬事前要吐沙）。", "蚬差不多开口，就下紫苏，再炒。", "全开口就完成了。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860132711132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860264611132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860314311132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860466411132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860455811132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860571311132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/13/20190113154738860636211132809.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：炒锅", "category": ["家常菜", "海鲜"]}

{"name": ["爆炒白米虾"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658470499410454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["葱", "草莓", "姜", "蒜", "玉米油", "盐", "生抽"], "taste": "葱香", "carfts": "炒", "time": "廿分钟", "difficulty": "普通", "step": ["来几盘都不够吃的。", "白米虾洗干净备用葱姜蒜切好备用。", "油锅烧至六成熟，倒入玉米油，炒香葱姜蒜。", "大火加入白米虾炒至2分钟。", "调入少许盐，生抽出锅白米虾炒至过程中不宜太长时间，时间太长会影响口感，流失营养。", "成品图。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658475532210454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658475615110454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658475794610454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658475858210454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658475999510454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/20190104154658476051010454906.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：炒锅", "category": ["热菜", "家常菜", "海鲜", "午餐", "晚餐"]}

{"name": ["松子扇贝"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465850075812304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["扇贝", "松子仁", "黄油", "橄榄油"], "taste": "原味", "carfts": "蒸", "time": "半小时", "difficulty": "简单", "step": ["扇贝处理干净。", "蒸锅水烧开后，放入扇贝，大火蒸7分钟。", "黄油从冰箱里拿出来后，趁硬切丁。", "平底锅加热，加入橄榄油和松子仁，中小火翻炒至变色。", "将黄油丁放在蒸好的扇贝上，趁热浇上松子仁即可。", "成品。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465851495492304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465851705522304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465851941502304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465852238282304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465852506242304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320", "https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2019/01/04/2019010415465852649152304656.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320"], "kitchenware": "使用的厨具：不粘锅、蒸锅", "category": ["海鲜", "午餐", "晚餐"]}

{"name": ["鱿鱼炒荷兰豆（如何泡发干鱿鱼）"], "fullImage_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/27/2018122715459150002617796837.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p800"], "ingredients": ["干鱿鱼", "荷兰豆", "小米辣", "盐", "酱油", "酒", "糖", "淀粉"], "taste": "咸香", "carfts": "炒", "time": "廿分钟", "difficulty": "普通", "step": ["干鱿鱼一条，水泡发了20个小时，已经泡发好了。", "荷兰豆、小米辣。", "用酱油、米酒、糖、淀粉调一个酱汁备用。", "鱿鱼切花，摊开鱿鱼肚的一面，先用斜刀片竖丝，不能切断。", "再用正刀切横丝。", "片好花后，再切成一块块备用。", "起油锅，先炒荷兰豆。", "炒好装盘备用。", "煮开水，将鱿鱼块焯水，鱿鱼片随着沸水加热会卷成花状，捞起沥干水份。", "起油锅，倒入鱿鱼翻炒。", "炒至变色将熟放入小米辣。", "再倒入酱汁收味。", "倒入刚刚炒好的荷兰豆翻炒一下即可。", "成品，泡的干鱿鱼味香浓，有点韧性弹牙，吃起来更香更有味。"], "stepPicture_url": ["https://i8.meishichina.com/attachment/recipe/2018/12/27/2018122715459152994817796837.jpg?x-oss-process=style/p320",
